name: INDUSTRIA BRASILEIRA DE ARVORES (IBA)
description: Trade association that represents Brazilian companies in the forest sector.
firms: BARRAL M JORGE CONSULTORES ASSOCIADOS LTDA
sampleDescriptions: IBA monitors regulations around the world that may affect its members, including regulation on pulp and paper, timber and lumber, and particularly legislation related to tariffs, international trade,
